review:
I bet you will love this movie.
The movie holds you till the end and the best is that a very strong and great presentation is delivered in minimum time. 
Kudos to Paresh Rawal....man! what a masterpiece he has as Mr. Khan. I actually get scared of him many times in the movie.
All actors are good with their roles. 
In conclusion,I'll say that this movie a must watch. It's a perfect and one of the finest Thrillers ever made in Indian Cinema. 
I'll give this movie 4/5 stars.
Go and watch. 
Thanks f ...MORE

It is the best movie about ragging
I loved it also because of the star cast Rajeev Khandelwal ,Tina Desai and Paresh sir.
Tnx for making such a beautiful movie.

I feel this is a MUST WATCH kind of a movie. The movie is basically about a game to complete challenges for money. It takes on its pace quickly but when the climax hits you, you are gonna be blown off as u would understand why this whole game was basically being played for. AWESOME CLIMAX .its emotional, sympathetic, entertaining. Watch it, thank me later.

I have watched the movie today and I have liked it. What ever we do in the past returns to us as a punishment in future that is why we should be good and never harm anyone, we never know when it will hit us again.
Ragging was bad and the punishment they got was good, till the end i felt sorry for them but seeing their flashbacks i did not.
Good movie i liked it

Table no.21 is an outstanding movie..Rajeev and paresh was awesome.its was really diffrnt from other thriller movies..in the climax they show a great msg to the youth about ragging..but its sad that the movie didnt get much collection in the box office.

Best film I have watched in last 15 days. Never thought it would give this heart wrenching feelings. 1st 1hour it was a thriller to me, but last 15 minutes have given me the teary eyes. Every people should watch this.

An extremely gripping movie. Will make you dead with suspense. Emotional. A truth telling story, after you watch it will change you. Highly recommendable that students that are about to join college or in college watch it.

Its very learning movie and everyone should must watch this because not only college students but most of the people make joke of another in thought that its only fun...but sometimes it affects their relationship or life

I have no words to describe. I'm really proud of the makers of this film.
You did a great job.
Just FANTASTIC
A deadly take on the iconic event of ragging in colleges. A cruel yet smart way to make realized how bad ragging is. Not all audience would enjoy this movie as it caters to something very serious.
Wonderful movie.  This movie tries to express the school views about students who have hard life at there schools thats why I love this movie
It's really a great film and one of the best underrated movie in Bollywood.  Please do watch it and it also delivers a great message in the end.

A very beautiful movie but at the same time dark too ....it portrays beautifully the consequences of ragging ..even though most of the seniors thinks that ragging is a small thing ...but in reality it is not ..i think this movie is way too underrated

Perhaps one of the best suspense thriller movie with a great message to give and outstanding performances...!!
